#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define sd(x) scanf("%d",&x);
#define slld(x) scanf("%I64d",&x);
#define LL long long
#define LD long double
#define PB push_back
#define MP make_pair
#define F first
#define S second
#define Fill(a, b) memset(a, b, sizeof(a))
#define INF 2000000009

typedef pair<int,int> PII;
typedef vector<int> VI;

#define N 110
#define C 10010

int ar[N];
int dp[C][N],cnt[N],tmp[C];

void solve()
{
	int n,c,sum=0,x;
	sd(n);sd(c);
	for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
	{
		for(int j=0;j<=c;j++)
		{
			dp[j][i]=0;
			tmp[j]=0;
		}
		cnt[i]=0;
	}
	for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
	{
		sd(ar[i]);
		cnt[ar[i]]++;
		sum+=ar[i];
	}
	sort(ar+1,ar+n+1);
	if(sum>2*c)
	{
		printf("NO\n");
		return;
	}
	else if(sum<=c)
	{
		printf("YES\n\n");
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			printf("%d ",ar[i]);
		}
		cout<<endl;
		return;
	}
	dp[0][0]=1;
	tmp[0]=1;
	for(int i=n;i>=1;i--)
	{
		for(int j=c-ar[i];j>=0;j--)
		{
			if(tmp[j]==1)
			{
				dp[j+ar[i]][i] = 1;
				tmp[j+ar[i]]=1;
				//cout<<j+ar[i]<<" "<<i<<" "<<dp[j+ar[i]][i]<<endl;
			}
		}
	}
	VI ans,temp,comp,idx;
	ans.PB(N);
	comp.PB(N);
	for(int j=sum-c;j<=c;j++)
	{
		x=j;
		//cout<<x<<endl;
		int i;
		temp.clear();
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			if(x==0)
			{
				break;
			}
			if(dp[x][i]==1)
			{
				temp.PB(ar[i]);
				//cout<<x<<" "<<i<<endl;
				x-=ar[i];
			}
		}
		if(x==0&&temp<ans)ans=temp;
	}
	if(ans==comp)
	{
		printf("NO\n");
		return;
	}
	cout<<"YES\n";
	for(int i=0;i<ans.size();i++)
	{
		printf("%d ",ans[i]);
		cnt[ans[i]]--;
	}
	cout<<endl;
	for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
	{
		//cout<<cnt[i]<<endl;
		while(cnt[i]--)
		{
			printf("%d ",i);
		}
	}
	cout<<endl;
}

int main()
{
	int t=1;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		solve();
	}
}
